group_1.textRight: If Hibiki-san’s voice really did reach the Three Magi...
That’d mean our plan succeeded...?

group_1.textLeft: ...Woah, you’re right!
Our strategy was a total success!?

group_1.textRight: No, no! This is just the first step!
It’s only one small step, but it’s a giant first leap!
...That’s for sure!

group_1.textLeft: Yeah... More verification is still needed,
but I believe...
our actions prompted a reaction from the Three @Magi.
That’s really amazing!

group_1.textRight: But... isn’t it somewhat frightening too?

group_1.textLeft: Why’s that?

group_1.textRight: Given that the Central Tower has a defense system,
that would mean it doesn’t want us approaching it, correct?

group_1.textLeft: ...Guess not.

group_1.textRight: Moreover... I reckon stopping and restarting time
has not happened many times before.

group_1.textLeft: ...I think so too.
It’s possible we just never noticed...
but to date,
there should be no traces of the Magi directly interfering with this world.

group_1.textRight: Ah...
And yet this time... they instantly stopped time...?

group_1.textLeft: It appears so... Perhaps we have stumbled
into forbidden territory that should not be @touched...

group_1.textRight: Eh... Huh?
If that really is the case... what’s going to @happen to us?

group_1.textLeft: ...It’s unclear... but...
the Three Magi have already reached an answer.

group_1.textRight: Eh...? What do you mean?

group_1.textLeft: ...Ah, that makes sense!

group_1.textRight: What are ya two randomly goin’ on about now?

group_1.textLeft: ...Sorry sorry! Let’s see, if the Magi
stopped time so they could talk,
then by now, they’ve decided on a solution, yeah?
Because time has restarted for us!

group_1.textRight: [chara:120302:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]!?
Yeah...
The Three Magi must have already reached an @answer...
Our next task is to find out what this answer is.
